about_intro1: Hi, my name is Alex Lima and I’ve been working in logistics for over 11 years, with experience across the entire supply chain — from procurement and receiving to stock, transportation, final delivery and reverse logistics.
about_intro2: I have hands-on experience in invoice control, asset management, carrier follow-up, traceability, and logistics KPIs. I master advanced Excel, Power BI, SQL, and Power Query — using data to support decisions and improve processes.
